content: प्रव्रजित {%<ab>p. p.</ab>%} {@--1@} Gone abroad or into exile. {@--2@} Turned a recluse. --तः {@--1@} A religious mendicant or ascetic in general. {@--2@} Especially, a Brāhmaṇa who has entered on the fourth (भिक्षु) order. {@--3@} The pupil of a Jaina or Buddhist mendicant. --ता {@--1@} A female ascetic. {@--2@} A spikenard. --तं Turning a recluse, the life of a religious mendicant.
